definitions: The action of dipping food (such as a doughnut or biscuit) into a drink (such as coffee or milk) before eating it.
The action of shooting a basketball by forcing it down through the hoop with the hand.
The action of immersing someone or something briefly in water or another liquid.
examples: She enjoys dunking her cookies in hot tea.
The player was known for his powerful dunking.
He was dunking his head under the water to cool off.
